name: Raguelmon
description: Raguelmon is a bestial angel with a feline theme. It has four catlike ears, green eyes with X-shaped pupils, and a fanged mouth. It wears a dark bevor and often covers its mouth with a metallic men-yoroi . Its dense fur forms a mane around its neck, while its back bears two ashen wings, each emblazoned with an amethyst jewel. Its wears a gold-and-black armor over its forearms and lower body, and its gauntlets project three Wolverine -style energy claws.
